recipe.title: Bibb and Tarragon Salad
ingredients: 3/4 lb Bibb lettuce (3 medium heads), larger leaves torn into bite-size pieces
1/4 cup loosely packed small fresh tarragon leaves
instructions: Whisk together vinegar, shallot, mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper until sugar and salt are dissolved, then add oil in a stream, whisking until emulsified.
Toss lettuce and tarragon with just enough dressing to coat and serve remaining dressing on the side.
